translation.es: "Debes casarte con él,

translation.en: "And then he can give you the money without it being taxable situation."
translation.es: y luego él puede darte el dinerosin que esté sujeto a impuestos".

translation.en: Very quickly, in the next day,
translation.es: Y rápido, al día siguiente,

translation.en: we went and got the license. You have to wait 24 hours. Like, boom,
translation.es: solicitamos la licencia.Tienes que esperar 24 horas.

translation.en: twenty-four hours, we did it and got married.
translation.es: Y en 24 horas, pum, nos casamos.

translation.en: We got married in November of 2012.
translation.es: Nos casamos en noviembre de 2012.

translation.en: So it was close to a year that I had known him.
translation.es: Hacía casi un año que lo conocía.

translation.en: There was a little… not a ceremony, but we had to hire somebody to do it,
translation.es: CERTIFICADO DEL MATRIMONIODE SARMA MELNGAILIS Y ANTHONY P. STRANGIS Hubo una pequeña ceremoniay contratamos a alguien que nos casó

translation.en: and it was in Tompkins Square Park.
translation.es: en el Parque Tompkins Square.

translation.en: It was a rainy day, and we were under our umbrellas.
translation.es: Era un día lluvioso y usábamos paraguas.

translation.en: That felt a bit romantic getting married because it just…
translation.es: Sentí que era romántico casarse porque…

translation.en: I don't know. It's hard not to.
translation.es: No sé. Es difícil no sentirlo.

translation.en: And the woman who married us,
translation.es: Y la mujer que nos casó

translation.en: her little talk that she gave was incredibly sweet and romantic.
translation.es: nos dijo unas palabrasincreíblemente tiernas y románticas.

translation.en: And so I sort of felt in the moment.
translation.es: Así que me sentí muy presente.

translation.en: [Nick] Sarma G-chatted me. She was like, "Hey, I'm coming to LA."
translation.es: Sarma me texteó por ChitChat:"Iré a Los Ángeles".

translation.en: I picked her up from the airport. She gets in. We're laughing.
translation.es: Fui por ella al aeropuerto.Se sube, nos reímos.

translation.en: And on the way home, she, like, shows me her wedding ring.
translation.es: En el caminome muestra su anillo de bodas. AYER NICK ME RECOGIÓ EN EL AEROPUERTO

translation.en: She's like, "I got married."
translation.es: AYER NICK ME RECOGIÓ EN EL AEROPUERTO Dijo: "Me casé".Y yo le dije: "¡Dios mío! Felicitaciones".

translation.en: And I was like, "Oh my God. Congratulations."
translation.es: Dijo: "Me casé".Y yo le dije: "¡Dios mío! Felicitaciones".

translation.en: I, I mean, I had no idea.
translation.es: Yo no tenía la menor idea.

translation.en: And then she goes on to say how she met this guy, and he's very cool.
translation.es: Y luego me contó cómo conocióa este tipo, y que es genial.

translation.en: And then she says, "I haven't told anyone at the restaurant yet."
translation.es: Y luego dijo: "No le he dichoa nadie en el restaurante".

translation.en: And it makes me go like,
translation.es: Y yo reacciono y digo:

translation.en: "What? Why?" Like, wha…
translation.es: "¿Qué? ¿Por qué?". No lo…

translation.en: If you're with someone, and you agree to get married to them,
translation.es: Si tienes una parejay aceptas casarte con el o ella,

translation.en: don't you want essentially the people that care about you to know?
translation.es: ¿no quieres que lo sepala gente que te quiere?

translation.en: It was very specific.
translation.es: No sé, fue explícito.

translation.en: She never told me she was getting married.
translation.es: Nunca me dijo que se iba a casar.

translation.en: It was like a non-event. It was kind of…
translation.es: Fue como algo sin importancia. Algo…

translation.en: You might think it's peculiar, but, you know, it's like…
translation.es: Podría parecer raro, pero…

translation.en: Yeah, there's no celebration.
translation.es: Pues no, no hubo celebración.

translation.en: I thought, "Damn, you could do better than that, you know."
translation.es: Yo pensé: "Oye, podrías tener algo mejor".

translation.en: One night, I was at the restaurant, and Shane texted me that they had gotten married.
translation.es: Una noche estaba en el restaurantey Shane me texteó que se habían casado.

translation.en: And it sounded romantic.
translation.es: Y sonó romántico.

translation.en: And on one level, I'm like, "Well, he sounds excited."
translation.es: Y por un lado pensé:"Pues, él parece emocionado".

translation.en: And I want to be. But all along, it had been like,
translation.es: Y yo quiero emocionarme.Pero todo el tiempo me la pasé:

translation.en: "Sarma, what's… You're not… What is happening?"
translation.es: "Sarma, ¿qué…? No irás a…¿Qué está pasando?".

translation.en: So I think I texted her because I wanted to confirm this,
translation.es: Así que creo que le texteé a ellaporque quería confirmarlo,

translation.en: and she confirmed it with zero excitement.
translation.es: y ella lo confirmó sin ningún entusiasmo.

translation.en: She had this awesome ring. I think it's on her book cover,
translation.es: Tenía un anillo lindo.En la portada de su libro

translation.en: this ring that I loved that had all these dangling things.
translation.es: traía un anillo que colgabaque me encantaba.

translation.en: It was Latvian. She's Latvian. And I always complimented her on it.
translation.es: Era de Letonia. Como ella.Y siempre le decía que es lindo.

translation.en: And then one day, I noticed she had it on her ring finger at the restaurant,
translation.es: Y un día noté que lo teníaen el dedo anular en el restaurante,

translation.en: and I sort of kiddingly…
translation.es: y como de broma,

translation.en: I was hoping I was kidding, but kind of knew that I wasn't,
translation.es: o esperaba que fuera broma,aunque sabía que no,

translation.en: and I said, "Oh, did you put that ring there to distract from your wedding ring?"
translation.es: pregunté: "¿Te lo pusiste ahí para desviarla atención de tu anillo de bodas?".

translation.en: And she was like, "Yes."
translation.es: Y ella respondió: "Sí".

translation.en: As a couple, they weren't really like a couple, you know?
translation.es: Como pareja, no parecían una pareja.

translation.en: Like they never, like, held hands. They weren't really affectionate.
translation.es: Nunca se tomaban de la mano.No eran muy cariñosos.

translation.en: What? Like, you guys got married?
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¿Se casaron?

translation.en: Like, it was like a big, like, surprise for everybody.
translation.es: Fue una gran sorpresa para todos.

translation.en: It didn't feel like a love story. It was just, you know, kind of weird.
translation.es: No parecía una historia de amor.Simplemente era un poco raro.

translation.en: There were tons of conspiracy theories about
translation.es: Había muchas teorías de la conspiración

translation.en: why she married him, was there some sort of blackmail involved,
translation.es: sobre por qué se casó con él,si fue por un chantaje o algo así

translation.en: or what it could possibly be.
translation.es: o por qué podría haber sido.

translation.en: [Sarma] He told me that he had some sort of like
translation.es: Él me dijo que tenía una especie

translation.en: underground government official military affiliation.
translation.es: de afiliación militar oficialy gubernamental clandestina.

translation.en: So that now, I would be, like, protected as his wife.
translation.es: Y que ahora me protegeríanpor ser su esposa.

translation.en: So at some point, he, via email,
translation.es: En algún momento, por correo electrónico,

translation.en: introduced me to somebody named Will Richards,
translation.es: me presentóa alguien llamado Will Richards,

translation.en: some sort of computer techie expert
translation.es: una especie de experto en informática

translation.en: that works in the government somewhere in Europe.
translation.es: que trabaja en el gobierno,en Europa, no sé dónde.

translation.en: [man] Shane and I were working together for years.
translation.es: Shane y yo trabajamos juntos durante años.

translation.en: There's a lot that I can't divulge.
translation.es: Hay mucho que no puedo divulgar.

translation.en: I was involved in making sure that Sarma didn't go off the rails.
translation.es: Estuve involucrado en vigilarque Sarma no se descarrilara.
